mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mypage (mypage_content, mypage_regdate, member_id) VALUES (#{mypage_content}, #{mypage_regdate}, #{member_id});
mapper.select: select member_id, member_pw, member_day, member_phone from member where member_id=#{member_id};

SELECT b1.board1_no, b2.board2_no, b3.board3_no, b4.board4_no, b1.board1_title, b2.board2_title, b3.board3_title, b4.board4_title FROM member m LEFT JOIN board1 b1 ON m.member_id = b1.member_id LEFT JOIN board2 b2 ON m.member_id = b2.member_id LEFT JOIN board3 b3 ON m.member_id = b3.member_id LEFT JOIN board4 b4 ON m.member_id = b4.member_id WHERE m.member_id = #{member_id} LIMIT 4;
